IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE REHABILITATIVE AND OTHER SERVICES TO PUBLIC OFFENDERS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WE PROMOTE PUBLIC SAFETY AND CHALLENGE OFFENDERS TO BECOME RESPONSIBLE, PRODUCTIVE CITIZENS THROUGH FIRM, FAIR, CONSISTENT SUPERVISION, TREATMENT, AND EDUCATION.
IRS990.Desc: THE ALPHA HOUSE: A MEN'S PRE-RELEASE CENTER (PRC) LOCATED IN BILLINGS, MT, SERVES AS AN INTERMEDIATE STEP BETWEEN PRISONS AND THE COMMUNITY. OFFENDERS LIVE IN THIS PRC UNDER TWENTY-FOUR HOUR A DAY SUPERVISION FOR APPROXIMATELY SIX MONTHS. THE RESIDENTS ARE REQUIRED TO OBTAIN EMPLOYMENT, PARTICIPATE IN COUNSELING, ABSTAIN FROM THE USE OF DRUGS OR ALCOHOL, MAINTAIN STRICT ACCOUNTABILITY FOR FACILITY RULES, OBTAIN A RESIDENCE FOR RELEASE, AND DEMONSTRATE THAT THEY ARE READY TO RETURN TO THE COMMUNITY AS PRODUCTIVE CITIZENS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PASSAGES IS COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS PRERELEASE CENTER FOR FEMALE ADULT OFFENDERS FROM THE MONTANA STATE WOMENS PRISON, FEDERAL BUREAU OF PRISONS, AND MONTANA PROBATION AND PAROLE. IN ADDITION TO PROVIDING SUPERVISION, TREATMENT AND REHABILIATIVE PROGRAMING IS PROVIDED TO THE OFFENDERS TO HELP AND CHALLENGE THEM BE SUCCESSFUL IN THEIR INTEGRATION INTO SOCIETY AS PRODUCTIVE CITIZENS. PASSAGES ALSO PROVIDES TWO SECURED SUPERVISION AND TREATMENT PROGRAMS FOR FEMALE OFFENDERS: AN ALCOHOL AND DRUG TREATMENT UNIT AND AN ASSESSMENT, SANCTION, REVOCATION AND HOLD CENTER. ALL UNITS UTILIZE THE THERAPEUTIC COMMUNITY MODEL WHICH IS DESIGNED TO INSTILL THE CONCEPT OF "RIGHT LIVING".

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: JAIL ALTERNATIVES AND MISDEMEANOR PROBATION PROVIDES COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS, REHABILITATIVE AND TREATMENT SERVICES TO YELLOWSTONE, STILLWATER AND CARBON COUNTIES FOR OVER 5,000 COMMUNITY AND LOCAL OFFENDERS. JAIL ALTERNATIVES PROVIDES SUPERVISION AND TREATMENT SEVICES DESIGNED TO REDUCE JAIL OVERCROWDING, TEACH RESPONSIBILITY, PERMIT NON-DANGEROUS OFFENDERS TO RETAIN EMPLOYMENT, AND SAVE THE TAXPAYER MONEY. THE MISDEMEANOR PROGRAM PROVIDES YELLOWSTONE COUNTY WITH PRETRAIL AND PROBATIONARY SERVICES WITH PARTICULAR EFFECTIVENESS IN DUI AND PARTNER/FAMILY MEMBER ASSAULT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALTERNATIVES RETAINED CUSTODY OF RESIDENTS CASH ACCOUNTS WHILE RESIDING IN THE FACILITY.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: ADVANCE REFUND THE REMAINING OUTSTANDING 2006 BONDS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT REVIEWS THE FORM 990 THEN REPORTS AND DISTRIBUTES THE 990 TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE, WHICH IS A BOARD COMMITTEE. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE RECEIVES DELEGATION FROM THE BOARD TO APPROVE AND FILE THE FORM 990. THE 990 IS THEN MADE AVAILABLE TO BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE POLICY IS DISCUSSED IN BY-LAWS AND MONITORED CLOSELY BY THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD ACTS UPON THE SALARY AND REVIEW OF THE ADMINISTRATOR (CEO). ALL OTHER SALARIES ARE RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE BOARD BY THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE AND FINANCE COMMITTEE WHEN APPROPRIATE. THESE COMMITTEES USE INFORMATION FROM ASSOCIATED EMPLOYERS, OTHER COMMUNITY CORRECTION AGENCIES, JOB SERVICE, ETC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE COMMITTEE ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THERE WERE NO CHANGES TO THE SELECTION PROCESS FOR THE CURRENT YEAR.
